name: Resources Xchange
description: Resources Xchange is a platform that introduces a new way of learning skills. You can find skills that you are interested in and request a learning exchange with your current skills.
tech: Built with Ruby on Rails API, React, Redux, Google Map Javascript API, JWT.

name: Project Planner
description: Project Planner is a tool that allows you to track your current projects.It allows you to browse, search, sort, create, edit current projects. As well as view the details, add and delete notes.
tech: Built with RoR API, React, Semantic-UI, CSS.

name: Portland ME Weather
description: This is a website that shows Portland Maine and its real-time weather. You can browse the photos and convert the degrees from Farenheit to Celcius.
tech: Built with HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, OpenWeather API.
